miami.name: Miami
miami.description: Cruise the crystal blue waters of Biscayne Bay. celebrity spotting on Star Island, and anchor for a sunset toast with the Miami skyline as your backdrop.

itinerary.activity: Anchor at Nixon Sandbar for swimming
Gourmet lunch onboard with skyline views
Cruise past celebrity homes on Star Island

nyc.name: New York City
nyc.description: Experience the grandeur of Manhattan from the water. Sail past the Lady Liberty and under the Brooklyn Bridge for an unforgettable urban escape.

itinerary.activity: Close-up views of Statue of Liberty
Sunset champagne toast under Brooklyn Bridge
Night skyline cruise back to harbor

vancouver.name: Vancouver
vancouver.description: Where mountains meet the sea. Explore the serene waters of English Bay and the fjord-like beauty of Indian Arm in ultimate luxury.

itinerary.activity: Relaxing cruise back through English Bay

toronto.name: Toronto
toronto.description: Escape the city buzz. Navigate the calm lagoons of the Toronto Islands and enjoy panoramic views of the CN Tower and city lights.

itinerary.activity: Anchor at Hanlan's Point for beach vibes
Sunset dinner with CN Tower views
